
Feature: Collision Investigator

  Scenario: Verify collision investigator loads and performs a search

    Given a SovereignVector instance is initialized with configuration
    And the SovereignVector has loaded core skills, skills from '.agent/skills', and skills from FrameworkRoot
    And the SovereignVector has built its index
    When I search for a query such as "please wrap up our project now"
    Then the search should return a list of results
    And the results should contain a score and a trigger
    
    When I search for a query such as "visuals refine"
    Then the search should return a list of results
    And the results should contain a score and a trigger

    When I search for a query such as "please implement our ui now"
    Then the search should return a list of results
    And the results should contain a score and a trigger
